verification.payload:
tree 9d6532ee487b441cf8015162929a075f84224216
parent 531c2b7c04898f5a2097f44e8c12bfb2f53aaf9b
author Jon Atack <jon@atack.com> 1626183676 +0200
committer Jon Atack <jon@atack.com> 1626271395 +0200

test: whitelist rpc_rawtransaction peers to speed up tests

in my testing from 45-55 seconds to 15.

files.patch:
@@ -56,6 +56,10 @@ def set_test_params(self):
             ["-txindex"],
             ["-txindex"],
         ]
+        # whitelist all peers to speed up tx relay / mempool sync
+        for args in self.extra_args:
+            args.append("-whitelist=noban@127.0.0.1")
+
         self.supports_cli = False
 
     def skip_test_if_missing_module(self):
